column1: A memorial service will be held on Thursday June 11 at First Presbyterian Church at 100 E 7th Street by Reverend Robert Hayes
column2: Dr. Richard Watson and Reverend Ron Brown.   The family will receive visitors at 10:00 a.m. and the service will be held at 11:00 a.m.
column3: with internment and military graveside rites at Evergreen Memorial Gardens.
